AutoComplete.name: AutoComplete
AutoComplete.description: * AutoComplete lets you suggest anything from an input element. Use a suggestion service or use a collection with the suggestions.*

Blink.name: Blink
Blink.description: * Blink lets you give visual feedback to the user. Blink can be used when the user performs some action that changes some data at the screen. Blink creates a visual highlight changing background color from yellow to white.*

Calendar.name: Calendar
Calendar.description: * Calendar shows months, and lets you move across the months of the year. Calendar lets you set one or many dates as selected.

Carousel.name: Carousel
Carousel.description: * Carousel is a large list of elements. Some elements will be shown in a preset area, and others will be hidden waiting for the user interaction to show it.*

Controls.name: Controls
Controls.description: * Controls brings the functionality of all form controls.*

Keyboard.name: Keyboard
Keyboard.description: * Keyboard event controller utility to know wich keys are begin.*

Support.name: Support
Support.description: * Returns a data object with features supported by the device*

Extend.name: Extend
Extend.description: * Extend is a utility that resolve creating interfaces problem for all UI-Objects.*

Countdown.name: Countdown
Countdown.description: * Countdown counts the maximum of characters that user can enter in a form control. Countdown could limit the possibility to continue inserting charset.*

Custom.name: Custom
Custom.description: * Custom creates a validation interface for validation engine.*

Dropdown.name: Dropdown
Dropdown.description: * Dropdown shows a list of options for navigation.*

Eraser.name: Eraser
Eraser.description: * Eraser lets you erase component's instances and free unused memory. A Numer will erase only that particular instance, a component's name will erase all components of that type, a "meltdown" will erase all component's instances from any kind.*

Expando.name: Expando
Expando.description: * Expando lets you show or hide the content. Expando needs a pair: the title and the content related to that title.*

Floats.name: Floats
Floats.description: * Floats brings the functionality of all Floats elements.*

Form.name: Form
Form.description: * Forms is a Controller of DOM's HTMLFormElement.*

Layer.name: Layer
Layer.description: * Layer lets you show a contextual floated data.*

List.name: List
List.description: * List lets you manage collections. Create a list of objects, add, get and remove.*

Menu.name: Menu
Menu.description: * Menu lets you organize the links by categories.*

Accordion.name: Accordion
Accordion.description: * Accordion lets you organize the content like folds.*

Modal.name: Modal
Modal.description: * Modal is a centered floated window with a dark gray dimmer background. Modal lets you handle its size, positioning and content.*

Transition.name: Transition
Transition.description: * Transition lets you give feedback to the users when their have to wait for an action.

Navs.name: Navs
Navs.description: * Navs is a representation of navs components.*

Min.name: Min
Min.description: * Min validates a number with a minimun value.*

Max.name: Max
Max.description: * Max validates a number with a maximun value.*

Price.name: Price
Price.description: * Price validates a number like the price format.*

Object.name: Object
Object.description: * Object represents the abstract class of all Objects.*

onImagesLoads.name: onImagesLoads
onImagesLoads.description: * OnImagesLoads executes a callback function when the images of a query selection loads.*

Positioner.name: Positioner
Positioner.description: * Positioner lets you centralize and manage changes related to positioned elements. Positioner returns an utility that resolves positioning for all widget.*

Preload.name: Preload
Preload.description: * Preload lets you load images on browser's memory. An array of sources will iterate and preload each one, a single source will do the same thing.*

Required.name: Required
Required.description: * Required validates that a must be filled.*

String.name: String
String.description: * String validates a given text as string.*

Email.name: Email
Email.description: * Email validates a correct email syntax.*

MinLength.name: MinLength
MinLength.description: * MinLength validates a minimun amount of characters.*

MaxLength.name: MaxLength
MaxLength.description: * MaxLength validates a maximun amount of characters.*

TabNavigator.name: TabNavigator
TabNavigator.description: * TabNavigator lets you create tabs for static and dynamic content.*

Tab.name: Tab
Tab.description: * Tab is a simple unit of content for TabNavigators.*

Tooltip.name: Tooltip
Tooltip.description: * Tooltip improves the native tooltips. Tooltip uses the 'alt' and 'title' attributes to grab its content.*

Uiobject.name: Uiobject
Uiobject.description: * Object represents the abstract class of all widgets.*

Validation.name: Validation
Validation.description: * Validation is a engine for HTML forms elements.*

Validator.name: Validator
Validator.description: * Validator is an engine for HTML forms elements.*

Viewport.name: Viewport
Viewport.description: * Viewport is a reference to position and size of the visible area of browser.*

Zoom.name: Zoom
Zoom.description: * Zoom shows a contextual reference to an augmented version of main declared image.*
